CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 14, 1957, page A18, reads: "Miller School Christmas Party - The P.T.A. of Miller School recently sponsored a Christmas party for the children who attend Miller School. Refreshments were served and members of the faculty and administration attended. John Brewer is the principal of Miller School. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of school children, and men and women from the Miller School P.T.A., including principle John Brewer Sr. standing in rear center right, gathered around tables with light colored tablecloths and drinking cups, in classroom interior with light colored wall, windows with pull blinds and grates, Christmas decorations, two portraits, and poster far left that reads "Fear Not... Great Joy...All People," another version
